data.title: Did Leon Lai tie the knot again? üíç The 54-year-old Heavenly King hinted at his marriage with Wing Chan on the last day of the ‚ÄúLeon Lai...
data.meta_description:
49 likes, 1 comments - yahoosg on July 26, 2021: "Did Leon Lai tie the knot again? üíç

The 54-year-old Heavenly King hinted at his marriage with Wing Chan on the last day of the ‚ÄúLeon Lai Talk & Sing 2021‚Äù concert on 18 July.

‚ÄúMarriage is the grave of love,‚Äù the singer declared during his concert. Then, talking to his audience as though two persons were having a conversation, Lai said that ‚ÄúThe Leon Lai you have seen earlier has stepped into his coffin. This Leon Lai is here on his behalf, walking out of the coffin.‚Äù

Fans and netizens speculated the declaration as an admittance that Lai had married Chan, who is 19 years his junior. As Lai's assistant, Chan used to work as his record label and now manages the agency. They were first spotted together in 2018, and she later gave birth to his daughter in the same year.

Read more: #linkinbio".
